metadata.title: CVE-2024-23085 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Apfloat v1.10.1 was discovered to contain aNullPointerException via the componentorg.apfloat.internal.DoubleScramble::scramble(double[], int, int[]). NOTE:this is disputed by multiple third parties who believe there was notreasonable evidence to determine the existence of a vulnerability. Thesubmission may have been based on a tool that is not sufficiently robustfor vulnerability identification.

criterions.comment: libapfloat-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
